Key Match Events: Mohamed Salah was injured at the 45th minute
Safaa Kasraoui mentions that Ghana scored the first goal through Mohammed Kudus
Omar Marmoush scored an equalizer for Egypt at the 69th minute
Kudus restored Ghana's lead two minutes later
Mostafa Mohamed scored an equalizer for Egypt
Pre-Game Insights: The game was hyped as a clash between Group B's most highly ranked teams
Both Egypt and Ghana needed to avoid a defeat to qualify for the round of 16
Post-Match Reflections: Egypt will go into their final game needing a victory to qualify to the next round
Ghana will have to muster a statement victory in their final group match against Mozambique to qualify
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game was tepid without exciting moments or scoring opportunities
The game was played in Rabat
Others: The game was part of the AFCON tournament
The game ended in a 2-2 draw
